scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && pnpm db:wait && pnpm db:push && pnpm db:seed
scripts.db:wait: node -e "const{exec}=require('child_process');let i=0;const c=()=>{exec('docker exec churchconnect-postgres pg_isready -U user',(e)=>{if(!e){console.log('✅ Database ready');process.exit(0)}else if(++i<30){setTimeout(c,1000)}else{console.error('❌ Database failed to start');process.exit(1)}})}; c()"
